title: The OnePlus 10 Pro is finally expanding to the US, Europe, and other regions on March 31
content:
Under Oppo’s roof, the OnePlus launched its 2022 flagship in China all the way back in January without any mention of when it would come to other markets. Soon, that’s changing. The OnePlus 10 Pro will be officially announced for other regions, including the US and Europe, on March 31.

more…

The post The OnePlus 10 Pro is finally expanding to the US, Europe, and other regions on March 31 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: On March 31, the OnePlus 10 Pro will be officially, finally announced for the US, Europe, and other global markets outside of China.
